0: A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE APPROPRIATE HOUSE COMMITTEE TO LOOK INTO, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, THE FINANCIAL SOUNDNESS OF PHILHEALTH AMIDST REPORTS OF INAPPROPRIATE USE OF FUNDS AND LOSSES SUFFERED BY THE AGENCY AS WELL AS TO REVIEW REPUBLIC ACT NO. 7875, AS AMENDED, WITH THE END IN VIEW OF STRENGTHENING AND IMPROVING THE QUALITY OF SERVICE OF PHILHEALTH
